sentences.en: He is a little unworldly about such matters.
sentences.cn: 他在这些事情上不太老练。

sentences.en: I am just a weltfremd, unworldly, young man.
sentences.cn: 我只是个与世无争的年轻人.

sentences.en: Kitty's family was unworldly, unimpressed by power, or money.
sentences.cn: 基蒂一家清心寡欲，淡泊金钱与权力。

sentences.en: She was so young, so unworldly.
sentences.cn: 她太年轻，太不懂人情世故。

sentences.en: The landscape had a stark, unworldly beauty.
sentences.cn: 那景色有一种简朴、超凡的美。

words.tran_cn: 超脱性；超凡脱俗的行为
非尘世的；精神上的，非物质的；天真的

trans.tran_cn: 不谙世故的，不善于处世的
trans.tran_en: unusual and having qualities that do not seem to belong to this world
